content: tag your photos with @ysolda and use the hashtags #ysolda and #northwindheadband pattern help this pattern has been thoroughly tech edited and tested and we hope you find it clear and easy to follow if errors are found we issue updates via email so if it s been a while since you purchased this pattern please double check that you have the most up to date version by comparing the version number in the footer to that listed on the northwind headband pattern page on our website the knitwork is our learning community of clubs guided kals and more for knitters and fans of ysolda patterns our ravelry group is a great way to connect with other knitters who have made the pattern and you ll often get a very quick response if you have a question feedback or think you ve found an error please email support@ysolda com you might also like daniel s hat radost knit a brioche accessory course browse all patterns northwind headband by ysolda v1 2 3
